dialogues.speaker: Jane
dialogues.text: Good morning, Emma, lovely weather today?

dialogues.speaker: Emma
dialogues.text: Absolutely, Jane. Perfect for our hike.

dialogues.speaker: Emma
dialogues.text: I can't wait to discover the hidden treasure together.

dialogues.speaker: Jane
dialogues.text: Let's make it happen, Emma. Our teamwork will lead us to success.
